name: unclad
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) not wearing any clothes: The magazine featured pictures of unclad models. The poster for the play shows two unclad people wearing masks. Synonyms
naked (NOT COVERED)
nude
(of a building or structure) with the surface not covered: We could just leave the exterior unclad. See also
cladding
More examplesFewer examplesA young woman stood naked to the waist with no hint that her unclad state caused her any concern. The skeletal, unclad girders of its roof stood stark against the darkening sky.
